程序包 utility

类 Utility

java.lang.Object
utility.Utility
public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
Utility class for common methods.

      public static java.lang.String formatMessage​(java.lang.String name, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonNode)
      Display the json object in a formatted way
      参数:
      name - the name of the object
      jsonNode - the json object
      返回:
      return the formatted string

    • displayJsonList

      public static void displayJsonList​(java.lang.String name, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonNode)
      Display the json object(value is a list and Nested json object) in a formatted way - [{}...{}]
      参数:
      name - the name of the object
      jsonNode - the json object

    • resolveError

      public static void resolveError​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode response)
      used for the Services.java, show a formatted error message
      参数:
      response - response body (only for errors respond) from the server

    • setDashboard

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> setDashboard​(int width, int height, java.lang.String title_name)
      Generate a DashBoard/Banner for the system (can be reused by all kinds of system)
      参数:
      width - the width you want
      height - the hdight you want
      返回:
      return ArrayList contains the dashboard that needs to display
